second generation
manage events and tasks using simple text files

etm is an acronym for event and task manager. This application provides a simple, intuitive format for using plain text files to store events, tasks and other data items and a cross-platfrom, Qt-based GUI for creating and modifying items as well as viewing them in a variety of convenient ways. Supported alarm types include display, sound, voice (using system text to speech), email, text message and process. Repetition is supported in a powerful and flexible manner for tasks as well as events. See sample entries below.

Installation instructions are in INSTALL.

Extensive documentation is in the help folder.
